and the Philadelphia 76ers keep winning. One night after a 41-point effort in Philadelphia's most lopsided win of the season, Allen Iverson scored an NBA season-high and career-best 54 in a 107-103 victory over the James Cleveland Cavaliers. It was like he was playing horse tonight, said 76ers guard Aaron McKie , who had 20 points and nine assists.`` Michael Jordan jumper was deadly.'' Larry Page. But why? According to sources speaking to the New Yorker, Eric Schmidt 's decision to depart from the role of CEO was intricately linked to Google's decision to pull out of China due to censorship concerns, with Eric Schmidt becoming frustrated when Larry Page and Sergey Brin sided against him in the controversy. Eric Schmidt apparently felt that Google should stay in China, the world's largest developing market, and he`` lost some energy and focus after losing the China decision. That loss of focus has had its effect on Google, which has seen many of its most prized engineers jumping ship to Facebook, while more and more governments have begun targeting Google over

.'' The pre-war attack never happened, although the site was struck in the opening days of the war that President Bush launched in March 2003, about a month after Colin Powell 's U.N. speech. The surprise shake-up announced Thursday appears to be driven by Eric Schmidt 's desire to assume more of a behind-the-scenes role as much as Page's personal ambition. Day-to-day adult supervision no longer needed! Eric Schmidt wrote on his Twitter account moments after Google Inc. dropped the bombshell that upstaged its fourth-quarter earnings.
